title: I Built a Geocoder for AI Agents Because I Couldn't Afford Google Maps
excerpt: Traditional geocoders fail AI agents 28% of the time due to vocabulary mismatch. Google works but costs $3.65M/year at scale. I built something better.

title: Everyone in Seattle Hates AI
excerpt: How Microsoft's AI strategy turned brilliant engineers against the technology they should be building.

title: Visualizing bsdiff: The Delta Compression Algorithm Used by macOS and Google Chrome
excerpt: An interactive exploration of the bsdiff binary diff algorithm used for software updates in macOS and Chrome.
